metadata.title: CVE-2019-13377 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
The implementations of SAE and EAP-pwd in hostapd and wpa_supplicant 2.xthrough 2.8 are vulnerable to side-channel attacks as a result ofobservable timing differences and cache access patterns when Brainpoolcurves are used. An attacker may be able to gain leaked information from aside-channel attack that can be used for full password recovery.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-13377` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

hostapd - 2:2.6-15ubuntu2.4
wpagui - 2:2.6-15ubuntu2.4
wpasupplicant - 2:2.6-15ubuntu2.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wpa package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:2.6-15ubuntu2.4').
